basics.name: Karim de Fombelle
basics.label: IT Manager
basics.summary: An experienced IT Manager (consulting, software house) in international environments.

work.name: Murex
work.summary: Team manager (~15 engineers including externals) in Murex integration modules, chiefly MxML, Reporting module and API Integration and data migration stream leader for various projects in APAC.

work.name: Murex
work.summary: Team manager (~15 engineers including externals) in Murex integration modules, chiefly MxML, Reporting module and API Integration and data migration stream leader for various projects in APAC.

work.name: Murex
work.summary: Technical leader of a development team (6 persons over 2 sites: Paris and Beirut) for Murex software company.

work.name: Capgemini
work.summary: Gaz Reseau Distribution de France GRDF web site for gas providers 20 collaborators. Lyonnaise des eaux : web site publishing data from water meters telereport, 5 collaborators. Architecture from prototype to go live, SIT, UAT, follow up with the client and reporting.

work.name: Capgemini
work.summary: Conception (UML) and service layer realisation in J2EE. I had also to maintain the physical data model, participate in integration, optimisation and deployment.

work.name: CNRS
work.summary: Java developer in a bioinformatic research project, The developed Java program proposes a role for unknown genes computing cross references between scientific experiments data (DNA chips array) and an annotated gene ontology.

education.studyType: Master of Sciences with High Honours

publications.name: THEA: ontology-driven analysis of microarray data
publications.summary: The developed Java program proposes a role for unknown genes computing cross references between scientific experiments data (DNA chips array) and an annotated gene ontology.
